ViewObject.Name: PrjNtfOrgDisVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT PRJ_NAME, PRJ_NUM, CARRYING_OUT_ORG_NAME, EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, EMP_ORG_NAME, DISTRIBUTION_AMOUNT, APPROVED_DATE, IMPORT_STATUS FROM (SELECT PPA.NAME AS PRJ_NAME, PPA.SEGMENT1 AS PRJ_NUM, HOUV.NAME AS CARRYING_OUT_ORG_NAME, CBP.EMP_NO, CBP.EMP_NAME, CBP.ORG_NAME AS EMP_ORG_NAME, CBP.DISTRIBUTION_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(CBP.APPROVED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPROVED_DATE, CBP.IMPORT_STATUS FROM APPS.CUX_BONUS_PRJ_DISTRIBUTION CBP, PA.PA_PROJECTS_ALL PPA, HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS HOUV WHERE CBP.PROJECT_ID = PPA.Project_Id AND PPA.CARRYING_OUT_ORGANIZATION_ID = HOUV.Organization_Id AND CBP.APPROVED_STATUS = '已审批' AND CBP.PROJECT_DISTRIBUTION_ID >= 10000 AND CBP.PERSON_ID > 0 AND ( TRUNC(CBP.APPROVED_DATE) BETWEEN (ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(:month,'yyyy-mm'),-1) + 10) AND (TO_DATE(:month,'yyyy-mm') + 9) ) AND (CBP.Import_Status = '无工资单' or CUX_HR_BONUS_PRJ.GET_COMP_ID_BYORGANIZATION(PPA.CARRYING_OUT_ORGANIZATION_ID) <> CUX_HR_BONUS_PRJ.GET_COMP_ID_BYORGANIZATION(CBP.ORG_ID)) AND CUX_HR_BONUS_PRJ.GET_COMP_ID_BYORGANIZATION(CBP.ORG_ID) = :org_id UNION ALL SELECT PPA.NAME AS PRJ_NAME, PPA.SEGMENT1 AS PRJ_NUM, HOUV.NAME AS CARRYING_OUT_ORG_NAME, CBPD.EMP_NO, CBPD.EMP_NAME, CBPD.ORG_NAME AS EMP_ORG_NAME, CBPD.DIST_AMOUNT AS DISTRIBUTION_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(CBPD.APPROVED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPROVED_DATE, CBPD.IMPORT_STATUS FROM CUX.CUX_BONUS_PRJ_DEPT_DIST CBPD, CUX.CUX_BONUS_PRJ_DISTRIBUTION CBP, PA.PA_PROJECTS_ALL PPA, HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS HOUV WHERE CBPD.PROJECT_DISTRIBUTION_ID = CBP.PROJECT_DISTRIBUTION_ID AND CBP.PROJECT_ID = PPA.PROJECT_ID AND PPA.CARRYING_OUT_ORGANIZATION_ID = HOUV.Organization_Id AND CBPD.APPROVED_STATUS = '已提交' AND ( TRUNC(CBPD.APPROVED_DATE) BETWEEN (ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(:month,'yyyy-mm'),-1) + 10) AND (TO_DATE(:month,'yyyy-mm') + 9) ) AND (CBPD.Import_Status = '无工资单' or CUX_HR_BONUS_PRJ.GET_COMP_ID_BYORGANIZATION(PPA.CARRYING_OUT_ORGANIZATION_ID) <> CUX_HR_BONUS_PRJ.GET_COMP_ID_BYORGANIZATION(CBPD.ORG_ID)) AND CUX_HR_BONUS_PRJ.GET_COMP_ID_BYORGANIZATION(CBPD.ORG_ID) = :org_id) T ORDER BY T.PRJ_NUM, T.EMP_ORG_NAME
